PreviousTxnID.description: The identifying hash of the transaction that most recently modified this object. This field was added in the `fixPreviousTxnID` amendment, so it may not be present in every object.

PreviousTxnLgrSeq.description: The index of the ledger that contains the transaction that most recently modified this object. This field was added in the `fixPreviousTxnID` amendment, so it may not be present in every object.
